block.p: Dr. and Mrs. Neal Ahlbaum of Manhasset Hills, L.I., have announced the engagement of their daughter, Cynthia Hope Ahlbaum, to Paul Eric Winkler, a son of Mr. and Mrs. George Winkler of Austin, Tex. A May wedding is planned.
Ms. Ahlbaum is a photographer and film maker in Roslyn, L.I. She graduated from the Parsons School of Design. Her father is an internist and a nephrologist in Garden City, L.I.

Dr. and Mrs. Neal Ahlbaum of Manhasset Hills, L.I., have announced the engagement of their daughter, Cynthia Hope Ahlbaum, to Paul Eric Winkler, a son of Mr. and Mrs. George Winkler of Austin, Tex. A May wedding is planned.
Ms. Ahlbaum is a photographer and film maker in Roslyn, L.I. She graduated from the Parsons School of Design. Her father is an internist and a nephrologist in Garden City, L.I.

Mr. Winkler is an owner of Book Kingdom, a bookstore in Glendale, Queens. His father is the executive editor for foreign-language textbooks at Holt, Rinehart & Winston, the publishing company, in Austin.
